entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione had sunk to the floor in fright;

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron pulled out his own wand – not knowing what he was going to do he heard himself cry the first spell that came into his head: ‘Wingardium Leviosa!’

entities.name: troll
entities.description: The club flew suddenly out of the troll’s hand,

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry got to his feet. He was shaking and out of breath.

relationships.description: Ron pulled out his own wand – not knowing what he was going to do he heard himself cry the first spell that came into his head: ‘Wingardium Leviosa!’
‘I don’t think so,’ said Harry . ‘I think it’s just been knocked out.’
